reviewText: I, too, wish this was available in English as well as the sequel. Our family had it in German with English subtitles.

I bought this to see Morten Harket of a-ha fame.  He's hardly there.  The story is cute and I'd love t give it to my neice, but there is no English language track and she's only 3 1/2 so I don't think she'll ever enjoy it.  It's cute, but not really worth owing
